item.title: Java Magazine: Intro to the Disruptor Part One
item.description: This month’s Java MagazineÂ features an article by yours truly, which is yet another intro to the Disruptor. It’s basically a summary of the stuff I’ve written in this blog, updated for version 2.7 - so the names of the classes should be up to date and the responsibilities follow the simplified pattern we use now. If you were looking for an more recent version of my introduction blog posts, this article gives a reasonable overview.
